name: Movie Sound Effects
description:
With hundreds of high quality movie sound effects from Action, Comedy, Kids, and Sci-Fi movies you can play the perfect noise or song at the exact right time!

Have you ever wanted to walk into a room and play the perfect movie sound effect for everyone to hear? You have hundreds to choose from!

Movie Sound Effects helps you do just that! And more!

Movie Sound Effects comes with:
- Explosions, Crashing Sounds, Sports Sounds
- Dozens of Action Movie Sound Effects
- Gasping, Crying, Laughing, Talking Sounds
- Dozens of Comedy Sound Effects
- Applause, Noises, Cartoon Sounds
- Dozens of Kids Movie Sound Effects
- Electric, Laser, Sci-Fi Sounds
- Dozens of other Sci-Fi Movie Sound Effects
- (Pro Version Only) Additional Action Sounds
- (Pro Version Only) Additional Comedy Sounds
- (Pro Version Only) Additional Kids Sounds
- (Pro Version Only) Additional Sci-Fi Sounds

Play multiple sound effects at once to make the perfect noises for you and your friends to hear!

Movie Sound Effects Features:
- Hundreds of ultra high quality sound effects, jingles, songs, and more
- iPhone, iPad, iPod touch compatible
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 5.1+
